name: Super Combat 3
overview: A split screen 2 player shooter written by Brian Hambley of Hambo Software. Additional mission data disks were to be available from the author. Super Combat 3 is a head to head battle for 2 players, set over 3 levels. Points are scored for shooting the enemy and rescuing hostages, or by destroying your opponents base. Weapons and power ups can be found and used by each player, you can carry 2 weapons at a time, each with limited ammo.
